newsitem.title: USA: Dataflex Corp FY 1997 shr loss $1.35.
newsitem.headline: Dataflex Corp FY 1997 shr loss $1.35.

text.p: NOTE: Net loss for the year ended March 31, 1997 included a pre-tax nonrecurring charge of $8,978,970 for losses on dispositions of businesses and a one-time pre-tax charge of $3,280,225 for impairment of assets.

The losses on dispositions of businesses represent the difference between the carrying value of the net assets of the Western, Eastern and Midwestern regions sold throughout the fiscal year and the final realized value.

The loss on impairment is comprised of $2,941,185 for write down of goodwill associated with the sale of the company's education division and a $339,040 charge for write down of the company's office property that is held for sale.
Liabilities decreased by $102,543,810 during FY 1997, while tangible net worth increased by $3,335,914 to $16,468,593 or $2.87 per share.
